doc.after: In 2003 Canada began helping Pakistan develop an accreditation system As stated in Ordinance No LIII of 2002 Para 10 Clause e the Higher Education Commission of Pakistan may set up national or regional evaluation councils or authorize any existing council or similar body to carry out accreditation of institutions including their departments facilities and disciplines by giving them appropriate ratings
